text:
Did Kirsten Dunst ’s fiance, Jesse Plemons , really skip the premiere of her new movie to avoid answering questions about their wedding plans? One of this week’s new tabloids claims the actor is unenthusiastic about his upcoming nuptials, but Gossip Cop looked into the story and we’ve exclusively learned the truth.
